--- 叶子节点
---@class bt_ac_sendMag : IAction
local bt_ac_sendMag = SimpleClassUtil:class(IAction)

function bt_ac_sendMag:initData(data)
    self._eventKey = data.eventKey
    self._params = data.params

end

function bt_ac_sendMag:doAction(blackBoard,agent,dt)
    if self._eventKey then
        EventManager:Dispatch_battle(self._eventKey, self._params )
    end
    return Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
end

return bt_ac_sendMag
